findings.details: Layouts already use responsive containers and semantic sections; post layout includes structured data for BlogPosting.
Network-restricted environment; external links were not validated in this run.
Site-level description/keywords/logo and page-level metadata are present; SEO tag is enabled in default layout.
Recent daily news posts present; portfolio and contact content is current.
CDN/analytics preconnect and dns-prefetch hints were missing.
Inline content images do not consistently include loading/decoding/alt attributes.

recommendations: Add preconnect/dns-prefetch hints for CDN and analytics domains
Ensure all content images receive lazy loading/async decoding and safe alt defaults
Re-run external link checks when network access is available
